name: Scorpions
description:
This is a linear story, I made the sprites and script to deal with the anxiety from Hurricane Matthew about to hit. It's about two girls who're very close, waiting for a hurricane to impact them.

This is also the first VN I've ever made, it was done very quickly, I hope you enjoy despite it being very amateur.

Reviewed very kindly by:

https://cadecadway.itch.io/

And a lovely Lets Play at:
